message: Some of these responses are unbelievable. Michelle Obama tried to start a good thing to nourish your kids. She can't police what each district puts in their lunches. You are all at choice. If your kids won't eat what's served, let them learn some life skills - make their own lunches at home and quit complaining. Geez!
Mexico placed actual illegal votes in our election. Millions of illegal votes. Not one single Russian vote was placed.

according to the USSC there are NO peace officers in the USA only law officers that work for them and not us. ripp your head out of your ass when ever have you seen an officer """"keep"""" or """"spread"""" peace

I would have done the same thing. I had an amnio in 1989. If something had been wrong, I would have terminated the pregnancy. I did not want my older 2 kids to have to perhaps eventually have to take care of a child with disabilities because Mom decided to wear a """"badge of honor"""". Sorry, folks, but that's what a lot of you ladies sound like when putting down someone that made a personal decision to terminate a pregnancy. Like somehow, you are special and deserve some medal because you made YOUR personal decision to continue with your pregnancy and anything otherwise is wrong because you have determined it to be so. That decision to have your child is yours, just like it was her decision to terminate. Her decision did not affect you in any way, so why make it personal.
Yeah, but what about Hillary's emails?.............. [sarcasm]
Rachel Maddow is an msm hack. Her reporting and lack of insight are pitiful.
liliPutins best friend... those two wish they ruled the whole world... but cant even feed their own people..
The companies don't care if you are happy and safe (ok, maybe a little-but only to the point where it affects sales). They care about profit and not losing profit by running afoul of the law.

ONE PERSON! A whole classroom of people and only ONE tried to stop him! The people in this country need to stop being victims. I keep picturing those Iraqi solders being marched out by ISIS to be beheaded. If you know you're gonna die FIGHT BACK WITH EVERY FIBER OF YOUR BEING!! As an US Army soldier (12 bravo) and a US Marine (0811) I tip my hat to the ONE gentleman who fought back. GOD BLESS YOU, speedy recovery!
